alert.note: Alert for Dripping Springs; Globe, Miami; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County; Superior (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 3:32PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gila, Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 415 PM MST... At 331 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking numerous strong thunderstorms across southern Gila county. Movement was southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Globe, Miami, Cutter, Central Heights-Midland City, Hilltop, Top-Of-The-World, Sawmill, Claypool, Inspiration and Roosevelt Estates. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 229 and 286. AZ Route 70 between mile markers 253 and 266. AZ Route 77 between mile markers 155 and 170. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Dripping Springs; Globe, Miami; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County; Superior
